title: MAGNIFICENT 101 SAGE + Roses Aromatherapy Candle for House Energy Cleansing, Banishes Negative Energy I Purification and Chakra Healing - Natural Soy Wax Tin Candle for Aromatherapy 6oz
features: 6 OZ AROMATHERAPY CANDLE − Made of Natural Soybean Wax (SGS and MSDS Report available - No Petroleum or Paraffin Wax). Devoted to clearing and abundance blessings. This blend of sage herbs and roses is designed to create a natural abundance state in the home and body.

LOVE VIBES − Elevate your vibration while burning this candle. Smudging is a cleansing ceremony that involves burning herbs and oils in a manner that fills the home with the fragrance while energetically cleansing the space and body, making room for a new intention in your mind. It is used to attract a specific desired outcome and can be done as often as needed.

ENERGY CLEANSING − It’s a good idea to have a door or window open while burning this candle. The negative energy and negativity have to have someplace to go! This helps make room in your mind for your new intention and what you want to attract into your life by raising your love vibration.

CLARITY FOR INTENTION SETTING − Choosing to sit and let go of negative thoughts in a ritual like this improves your mental clarity, allowing you to set your most genuine intention and make room for a new stage of good, elevated thoughts. Fill in the blank with your intention in lieu of what is being released.

CHAKRA HEALING − This healing candle collection was designed for smudging, purification, stress relief, anxiety soothing, enhancing peaceful feelings and ultimately providing an energy boost. It provides a whole experience making it the perfect gift for women as well as men. Love, light, and positive energy goes into every candle.
description: Product Description ENERGY CLEANSING The Latin word for sage salvia stems from the word heal. It's devoted to clearing, protection, and blessings. This blend of earthy sage creates a natural harmony in the home and body. Clarity for Intention Setting: Choosing to sit and let go of negative thoughts in a ritual like this improves your mental clarity, allowing you to set your highest, most genuine intention. Fill in the blank with your intention in lieu of what is being released. Love, light, and positive energy goes into every candle. Pure White Sage Smudge Candle for Home Energy Cleansing SMUDGE AWAY NEGATIVE ENERGIES Smudging is a cleansing ceremony that involves burning white sage in a manner that fills the home with the fragrance of the smoke. It is used to clear negative energy from people, places, or even objects and can be done as often as needed. Benefits of Smudging: Release past traumas or negative experiences Cleanse objects and crystals Make your space more positive Boost your mood and make you fill uplifted Reduce stress, and anxiety Cleanse your aura or personal energy White sage is considered by the spiritual community across the globe as an energy cleanser, mind clarifier, and a warder of evil in the home. Filling in the blank with your intention on the back of the candle opens the flow towards a meditative state of mind. This candle provides a sharp framework to shift the energy and set new intentions in a way that resonates with the Universe. How to Use: Declutter: Visual chaos slows down energy and cuts the flow. Open a window: The negative energy and negativity have to have someplace to go! Write your intention: Write your intention on the back of the candle. Light up the candle: Allow yourself to enter into relaxation mode. Visualize your intention: Concentrate on your desired outcome. Blow out the candle: You can blow out the candle once you feel clarity of mind. Expect manifestations!
